resources.string: Resume
Hello world!
Settings
Hello blank fragment
" Need money"
Pioneered the utilization of brand new test automation software for Salesforce applications using Java and XML style scripts.
Developed Digital Order Fulfillment (Paperless Order Processing) using Salesforce, Apex, and DrawLoop with EchoSign.
Optimized QA with a programmable automated Testing Suite for Android based POS devices, paired with a custom framework to create hardware tests that run unsupervised.
Bringing the Beam and WaveGuide projects to Android to expand user base from solely iOS with a simpler, yet equally effective application
Utilized various Java/Android frameworks/APIs (Foursquare, Instagram, Apache Commons HTTP) to expand the company\'s portfolio
Planning, designing, and implementing a revolutionary iOS/Android application for a brand new start-up
Bringing Agile development methodologies to the company, leading project planning, identifying/delegating tasks to developers, and leading team meetings
Supervising students\' learning of Java concepts in ways that worked for the students\' growth in computer science, both personally and academically.
Planning, designing, and implementing a companion iOS/Android app for RapPad.co, a website for hip-hop lovers and creators.
Met API requirements and implemented various features of the RapPad website, including a freestyle rap coach, writing assistant, and local/online database for storage.
J’ai passé une année en Australie dans le cadre d’un permis vacance-travail. J’ai pu perfectionner mon anglais et découvrir différents jobs dans l’accueil et l’hotellerie.
An app which brings a dedicated Question and Answer platform to iOS/Android, complete with text, picture, and video Q and A for users to effectively ask questions where text will just not suffice.
Share your style with the world! Rate other people’s wardrobes and get an opinion about your own. Perfect for the fashion-conscious!

A small project that takes in a user’s location and shows all the restaurants in that area that are not chain restaurants. This project includes a Java API and an Android app which utilizes Foursquare, Yelp, and Google Places APIs

Durant ce stage j’ai eu l’occasion de gérer l’organisation et la communication d’un événement (une Game Jam acceuillant plus de 100 personnes pendant deux jours dans les locaux de l’association) et plus spécifiquement le montage d’une vidéo résumant les 48h de création.

Suite à un stage j’ai réalisé un service civique au sein de l’association de solidarité internationalle Experts-Solidaires. J’ai pu apprendre à gérer la communication quotidienne d’une petite structure, animer une communauté de plus de 5000 professionnels sur Linkedin, assurer la création de divers suports de communication (Newsletter, Plaquette de présentation, visuels pour les réseaux sociaux..) et réaliser la refonte d’un site web sous joomla

Facilitated paperless contracts and agreements between AutoTrader and dealerships looking to buy advertising space on the AutoTrader.com website. DOF allows for faster contract delivery and e-signatures.

Passionné par le webmarketing et la communication interactive j’ai suivi une formation qualifiante de nivau 2 afin de valider mes acquis et dévelloper mes compétences.J’ai appris à animer une communauté, réaliser divers suports visuels sous illustrator et photoshop et créer un site web via wordpress
